item.title: 澳大利亚第四季度工资增速为两年多来最慢
item.description: 尽管失业率接近历史低点，澳大利亚第四季度的工资年增长率仍是两年多来最慢的，这表明强劲的劳动力市场并不妨碍通胀率的进一步下降。【原文：Australian wages rose at the slowest annual pace in more than two years in the fourth quarter even as unemployment stayed near historic lows, suggesting the strong labour market was not a bar to further declines in inflation.】

item.title: 新西兰央行降息 50 个基点
item.description: 新西兰央行周三将基准利率下调50个基点至3.75%，决策者们试图重振陷入困境的经济。【原文：New Zealand's central bank cut its benchmark rate by 50 basis points to 3.75% on Wednesday as policymakers sought to revive a struggling economy, and markets bet that moderating inflation will bring borrowing costs even lower over coming months.】

item.title: 美元因乌克兰紧张局势而走强，奇异果等待新西兰央行决定
item.description: 周三，美元因关税担忧和紧张的俄乌谈判而走高，而新西兰元则因交易商准备再次超大规模降息而企稳。【原文：The U.S. dollar perked up on Wednesday on the back of tariff concerns and tense Russia-Ukraine negotiations, while the New Zealand dollar steadied as traders braced for another super-sized interest rate cut.】

item.title: 日本出口连续第四个月增长；担心美国征收汽车关税
item.description: 周三的数据显示，日本出口连续第四个月增长，这表明在对美国关税政策日益担忧的情况下，强劲的全球需求正在支撑日本的经济复苏。【原文：Japan's exports rose for a fourth consecutive month, data showed on Wednesday, signalling that strong global demand is underpinning the country's economic recovery amid growing concerns over U.S. tariff policies.】

item.title: 美国参议院确认坎托菲茨杰拉德的卢特尼克出任商务部部长
item.description: 美国参议院周二以 51 票赞成、45 票反对的结果确认了唐纳德-特朗普总统提名的华尔街公司 Cantor Fitzgerald 的董事长兼首席执行官、亿万富翁霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）为商务部部长。【原文：The U.S. Senate voted on Tuesday by a 51-45 vote to confirm President Donald Trump's nominee Howard Lutnick, the billionaire chairman and CEO of Wall Street firm Cantor Fitzgerald, to run the Commerce Department.】

item.title: 新加坡电信第三季度净利润增长 22
item.description: 新加坡电信公司（Singapore Telecommunications）周三公布的第三季度基本净利润增长 22%，主要得益于其澳大利亚电信部门 Optus 的强劲贡献。【原文：Singapore Telecommunications reported a 22% rise in its third-quarter underlying net profit on Wednesday, boosted by strong contributions from its Australian telecom unit Optus.】

item.title: 新加坡大华银行第四季度利润超预期，公布 22 亿美元资本回报
item.description: 新加坡大华银行（UOB）周三公布的第四季度净利润增长9%，超过预期，并宣布了一项30亿新元（22.4亿美元）的剩余资本返还计划，之后该行维持了2025年的业绩指导。【原文：Singapore's United Overseas Bank, or UOB , maintained its guidance for 2025 after posting on Wednesday a 9% rise in fourth-quarter net profit that beat expectations and announcing a S$3 billion ($2.24 billion) package to return surplus capital.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州法官为反洗钱法的执行扫清障碍
item.description: 德克萨斯州的一名联邦法官周二取消了一项命令，该命令阻止了一项反洗钱法的实施，该法迫使数百万企业实体向财政部披露其真实受益所有人的身份。【原文：A federal judge in Texas on Tuesday lifted an order that blocked the enforcement of an anti-money laundering law that forces millions of business entities to disclose the identities of their real beneficial owners to the Treasury Department.】

item.title: 日本制造商 2 月份情绪连续第二个月好转：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社 Tankan 民意调查显示，2 月份日本制造商的商业景气连续第二个月攀升，预计到 5 月份将再次改善，尽管幅度不大。【原文：Business sentiment for Japanese manufacturers climbed for a second straight month in February and is expected to have improved again by May, albeit modestly, the Reuters Tankan poll found.】

item.title: Mondelez 首席执行官称肯尼迪议程产品重新配方将意味着涨价
item.description: Mondelez 公司首席执行官德克-范-德-普特（Dirk van de Put）周二表示，奥利奥制造商将面临美国卫生部长小罗伯特-肯尼迪（Robert F. Kennedy Jr）发起的 "让美国再次健康起来 "运动带来的新的成本压力，美国人将看到价格上涨。【原文：Mondelez CEO Dirk van de Put on Tuesday said the Oreo maker will face new cost pressures from the Make America Healthy Again movement spearheaded by U.S. health secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr and that Americans would see price hikes.】

item.title: 恒天然为面向消费者的业务寻找潜在买家，任命 IPO 团队
item.description: 乳业巨头恒天然周三表示，将在未来几周内与全球消费者业务和综合业务的潜在买家接触，并任命了主要管理团队成员，为首次公开募股做准备。【原文：Dairy giant Fonterra said on Wednesday it would engage with potential buyers of its global consumer business and integrated businesses over the coming weeks, and also named key management team members in preparation for an initial public offering.】

item.title: 必和必拓通过发行美国债券融资 30 亿美元
item.description: 全球最大的上市矿商必和必拓集团（BHP Group）周三表示，该公司通过在美国发行高级无担保债券筹集了 30 亿美元。【原文：BHP Group , the world's largest listed miner, on Wednesday said it raised $3 billion through an issue of senior unsecured bonds in the United States.】

item.title: 雪佛龙员工消化期待已久的裁员，首席执行官承诺承担责任
item.description: 在上周举行的一次内部全体会议上，大约 4 万名雪佛龙员工观看了一段视频，介绍这家石油巨头作为科罗拉多州最大的石油和天然气生产商在科罗拉多州取得的成功。【原文：During an internal town hall meeting last week, roughly 40,000 Chevron employees were shown a video touting the oil giant's success in Colorado as the largest oil and gas producer in the state.】

item.title: 美国农业部表示，不会因最新的螺旋虫病例而禁止从墨西哥进口牛只
item.description: 美国农业部周二表示，在边境南部的一头牛身上再次发现一种名为 "新世界螺旋虫 "的破坏性害虫后，美国农业部将不会限制从墨西哥进口牛。【原文：The U.S. Department of Agriculture will not restrict cattle imports from Mexico after another discovery of a damaging pest called New World screwworm in a cow south of the border, the agency said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 芯片设计软件制造商 Cadence 预测年度利润低于预期，股价下跌
item.description: 本周二，Cadence 设计系统公司（Cadence Design Systems）预测其年度收入和利润将低于分析师的预期，这表明随着客户在严峻的经济形势下紧缩开支，对其芯片设计软件的需求疲软。【原文：Cadence Design Systems forecast its annual revenue and profit below analysts' estimates on Tuesday, in a sign of soft demand for its chip design software as clients tighten spending in a tough economy.】

item.title: 早间竞价：利率决议接踵而至，市场坚守高位
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 花旗银行将首席执行官简-弗雷泽 2024 年的薪酬定为 3450 万美元
item.description: 花旗集团周二表示，已将首席执行官简-弗雷泽 2024 年的薪酬定为 3 450 万美元。【原文：Citigroup said on Tuesday it had set Chief Executive Officer Jane Fraser's 2024 compensation at $34.5 million.】

item.title: 特朗普计划征收 25% 的汽车关税，重塑美国贸易政策
item.description: 长期以来，特朗普一直在指出他所谓的美国汽车出口在国外市场受到的不公平待遇。【原文：Trump has long pointed to what he calls unfair treatment of U.S. automotive exports in foreign markets.】

item.title: 花旗集团任命 Nicole Giles 为首席会计官
item.description: 花旗集团周二表示，Nicole Giles 将从 2 月 21 日起担任该公司的首席会计官。【原文：Citigroup said on Tuesday Nicole Giles will be its chief accounting officer, effective as of February 21.】

item.title: 西方石油公司报告第四季度亏损
item.description: 西方石油公司（Occidental Petroleum）周二公布了第四季度亏损报告，石油和天然气公司受到了价格下跌的影响。【原文：Occidental Petroleum reported a fourth-quarter loss on Tuesday, as the oil and gas firm was hurt by lower prices.】

item.title: 澳大利亚国民银行第一季度现金收益因减值费用增加而下滑
item.description: 澳大利亚国民银行周三公布，受信贷减值费用和所得税费用增加的影响，其第一季度现金收益下降了 3%，抵消了基本利润的增长。【原文：National Australia Bank reported a 3% drop in its cash earnings for the first quarter on Wednesday, impacted by higher credit impairment charges and income tax expense, which offset growth in underlying profit.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，英国石油公司（BP）考虑出售价值 100 亿美元的嘉实多润滑油部门
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道，石油巨头英国石油公司（BP）正在考虑出售其润滑油业务嘉实多（Castrol），交易价值约为 100 亿美元。【原文：Oil major BP is considering a potential sale of its lubricants business, Castrol, which could be worth about $10 billion in a deal, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Bumble 预测第一季度收入低于预期，股价下跌
item.description: 周二，Bumble 预测其第一季度营收低于分析师预期，这表明这家约会应用运营商促进增长的努力比预期花费的时间更长，导致其股价在盘后交易中下跌了 11%。【原文：Bumble forecast its first-quarter revenue below analysts' estimate on Tuesday, signaling that the dating app operator's efforts to boost growth is taking longer than expected, sending its shares down 11% in extended trading.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，银湖公司接近达成收购英特尔 Altera 部门多数股权的交易
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周二援引知情人士的话报道称，收购公司银湖（Silver Lake）正在就收购英特尔可编程芯片业务 Altera 的多数股权进行独家谈判。【原文：Buyout firm Silver Lake is in exclusive talks to purchase a majority stake in Intel's programmable chip business Altera, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Pershing Square 提议以每股 90 美元的价格购买霍华德-休斯公司的 1000 万股股票
item.description: 亿万富翁投资者比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）的潘兴广场资本管理公司（Pershing Square Capital Management）周二表示，将以每股 90 美元的价格购买霍华德-休斯控股公司（Howard Hughes Holdings）新发行的 1,000 万股股票，这是该公司对这家房地产开发商提出的修订方案。【原文：Billionaire investor Bill Ackman's Pershing Square Capital Management said on Tuesday it would buy 10 million newly issued shares of Howard Hughes Holdings for $90 apiece in its revised proposal for the real estate developer.】

item.title: 12 月份外国持有的美国国债减少
item.description: 美国财政部周二公布的数据显示，由于美国国债最大的两个外国持有者--日本和中国--都削减了国债投资组合，12月份外国持有的美国国债数量有所下降。【原文：Foreign holdings of U.S. Treasuries fell in December as the two largest foreign holders of the government debt, Japan and China, both cut their portfolios, data from the Treasury Department showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 先锋 ETF 有望超越道富基金成为全球最大基金
item.description: 根据FactSet、LSEG和其他来源的数据，先锋集团（Vanguard Group）的标准普尔500指数ETF正处于最终从竞争对手道富环球顾问公司（State Street Global Advisors）的产品SPDR S&P 500信托基金手中夺取全球最大交易所交易基金头衔的边缘。【原文：Vanguard Group's Standard & Poor's 500 ETF is on the edge of finally seizing the title of the world's largest exchange-traded fund from rival State Street Global Advisors' product, the SPDR S&P 500 Trust , according to data from FactSet, LSEG and other sources.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会寻求印度帮助调查阿达尼公司欺诈案
item.description: 周二的一份法庭文件显示，美国证券交易委员会已请求印度当局协助调查阿达尼集团创始人高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）及其侄子萨加尔-阿达尼（Sagar Adani）涉嫌证券欺诈和 2.65 亿美元的贿赂计划。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has requested assistance from Indian authorities in its investigation of Adani Group founder Gautam Adani and his nephew Sagar Adani over alleged securities fraud and a $265 million bribery scheme, a court filing showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 贝莱德在 ESG 新规出台后暂停公司会议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，贝莱德暂时中止了与一些投资组合公司的会面，同时研究美国证券交易委员会新的报告规则的影响。【原文：BlackRock has temporarily paused meetings with some portfolio companies while studying the impact of new reporting rules from the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 上周美国原油和汽油库存可能增加，馏分油库存减少：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社周二的一项初步民意调查显示，预计上周美国原油和汽油库存将有所增加，而馏分油库存则可能下降。【原文：U.S. crude oil and gasoline stockpiles were expected to have risen last week, while distillate inventories likely fell, a preliminary Reuters poll showed on Tuesday.】
